title: How can I get 20RP for free
body: I just got dunky darius and im left with 271 rp, 19rp of a chroma. is there any way of me getting that amount for free? thank you for opinions

replies.body: That's pretty close towards a chroma!  Congrats on getting the dunkmaster on your team.  :)  Maybe we can work something out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport), and we'll get back to you!
